meanings.definition: Capable of being detected by immunoassay.
meanings.sent1: The immunoassayable protein was easily found in the blood sample.
meanings.sent2: The immunoassayable marker helped identify the presence of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The immunoassayable substance waved at the microscope, saying, 'Here I am!'
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as immunoassayable as a glowing beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The immunoassayable glow of the firefly lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: Able to be measured using immunoassay techniques.
meanings.sent1: The immunoassayable levels of the hormone were within the normal range.
meanings.sent2: Researchers found the immunoassayable concentration of the drug in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The immunoassayable data danced on the screen, making the scientists' day.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as immunoassayable as the accuracy of a scientific instrument.
meanings.sent5: The immunoassayable results confirmed the effectiveness of the treatment.
